description:
With StatisticZ for Piwik you can access nearly all of your Piwik (http://piwik.org) data. Stay up to date with all your web statistics on your HP webOS device! 

Features:
- visits
- Locations & Providers
- Screen Resolutions, Configurations
- Settings (OS, Browser, Screen)
- Referrers
- Search engines & keywords
- Multiple accounts - you can setup more than just one Piwik account.

If a problem or an error occurs please contact us: info@zefanjas.de.
